import styled from "styled-components" import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableSortLabel } from '@material-ui/core' import StripeContainer from "./StripeContainer" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from "react" import '../index.css' const ShoppingCart = () => { const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false) const setModalIsOpenToTrue = () => { setModalIsOpen(true) } const setModalIsOpenToFalse = () => { setModalIsOpen(false) } return ( Shopping Cart Your Items PRICE Quantity Total 2018 HELLO Remove 100€ Update €100
{showItem ? setModalIsOpen(false)} /> : <> } ) } const Container = styled.div` width: 60%; margin: 100px auto; ` const Img = styled.img` width: 20px; ` const WrapperTitle = styled.div`` const TitleCart = styled.h1` margin-bottom: 20px; ` const WrapperTable = styled.div`` const WrapperCart = styled.div` background-color: gray; ` const InfoItems = styled.div`` const Date = styled.span`` const Title = styled.span`` const ButtonRemove = styled.button`` const Input = styled.input`` const UpdateButton = styled.button`` const InfoQuantity = styled.div`` export default ShoppingCart
